title: Xos: a cry for help
creator_credit: Alan Woodruff, Roberta Chuter and Swinburne Institute of Technology. Film and Television School
brief_description: Two transvestite brothers argue over the fate of their deceased grandmother: should she be buried in the family plot, or stuffed and placed beside her favourite dog?
creator_credit_for_label: Alan Woodruff, Roberta Chuter and Swinburne Institute of Technology. Film and Television School
description: Two transgender brothers argue over the fate of their deceased grandmother: should she be buried in the family plot, or stuffed and placed beside her favourite dog?
